1st 7610 Photos - At Home
Originally uploaded by roland.

My resolve to wait several more months for the 6630 broke down when I saw Marc Canter’s 7610. Yes the keypad is dodgy, the EXIF data is incomplete and it doesn’t work with iSync on the Mac yet, but the camera is decent and fun. Check out my first 7610 photos. I will upload some cheesy videos too! Now to activate GPRS and try out email and web apps like Flickr.
